snippet: Quarterback Kirk Cousins will face the porous secondary of the Panthers, who need three straight wins to avoid going from a Super Bowl defeat to a losing season....
abstract: Preview of NFL matchup between Carolina Panthers and Washington Redskins.
lead_paragraph: Quarterback Kirk Cousins will face the porous secondary of the Panthers, who need three straight wins to avoid going from a Super Bowl defeat to a losing season.

headline.main: Monday’s N.F.L. Matchup: Carolina Panthers (5-8) at Washington Redskins (7-5-1)
